name: EP Carrillo - Allegiance - Sidekick Robusto
additionalNotes: E.P. Carrillo Allegiance is a cigar bearing the Carrillo name thatâ€™s being produced in Nicaragua by Oliva Cigar Co.This version of Allegiance is all Nicaraguan, except for the Sumatra-seed wrapper grown in Ecuador. The blend is intended to be medium-to-full in body. It comes four sizes: Robusto, Toro, Double Corona. This project is an ode to the deep roots EPC has in the industry, the friendships and the bonds they have made over the years.
